title: ðŸ“š TTBTrackr UofT Module V2.0
description: Elevate your UofT tracking experience with TTBTrackr's UofT module. The Original TTBTrackr Module ðŸ˜€

fields.name: Track Existing Course Activities
fields.value: Effortlessly monitor vacancies in ongoing course activities using `/uoft track existing`. TTBTrackr will utilize your profile to send you direct messages upon vacancy discoveries.

fields.name: Track New Course Sections
fields.value: Stay updated on new course sections opening by using `/uoft trak new`. TTBTrackr will utilize your profile to send you direct messages upon new section discoveries.

fields.name: Remove Tracked Courses
fields.value: Untrack courses using `/uoft untrack`. Note that newLec/newTut/newPra cannot be removed yet due to technical limitations. This feature is currently in progress.

fields.name: View Tracked Courses
fields.value: To review all your tracked courses, utilize `/uoft list`. This command will furnish you with a comprehensive list of the courses you are currently tracking.

fields.name: Important Note Regarding Tracking Courses
fields.value: Please note that this bot works across all three UofT campusses. As such, the bot requires the campus code (ex: `H5`) to be specified when tracking courses. For example, to track CSC108 at UTM, you would use `/uoft track existing CSC108H5`.
